name: Edge Of Night
passive: Annul: Gain a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability (40 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Health, Armor. Passive effect: Gain a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability (40 second cooldown).. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: The penetration helps maintain damage relevance as the game progresses
Great for assassins looking to eliminate priority targets
Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy physical damage compositions
